entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Dome Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:07 PM PST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then mainly cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow or rain. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain or snow. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 17 February 2023
